edu.harvard.util.graph

Class BaseSummaryNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.util.graph.BaseNode
      • edu.harvard.util.graph.BaseSummaryNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BaseNode>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SummaryNode

    public class BaseSummaryNode
extends BaseNode
implements java.io.Serializable
    A group of base nodes
    Author:
    Peter Macko
